changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table person ( id int not null primary key, name varchar(255) null, surname varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table marks ( id int auto_increment primary key, mark int null, review varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table course ( id int auto_increment primary key, description varchar(255) null, hours varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table teacher ( id int not null primary key, name varchar(255) null, surname varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table student ( id int not null primary key, name varchar(255) null, surname varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table task ( id int auto_increment primary key, description varchar(255) null, course_id int null, mark_id int null, constraint task_course_fk foreign key (course_id) references course (id), constraint task_marks_fk foreign key (mark_id) references marks (id) );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table teacher_courses ( id_teacher int not null, id_course int not null, primary key (id_teacher, id_course), constraint teacher_courses_course_fk foreign key (id_course) references course (id), constraint teacher_courses_teacher_fk foreign key (id_teacher) references teacher (id) );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table students_courses ( id_student int not null, id_course int not null, primary key (id_student, id_course), constraint students_courses_student_fk foreign key (id_student) references student (id), constraint students_courses_course_fk foreign key (id_course) references course (id) );
